docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES, Argentina, Dec. 1--All of South America is closely watching the present political crisis in Chile because upon its solution depends whether the Communist party will be able to hold on to the only government position it has been able to...
docs.lead_paragraph: BUENOS AIRES, Argentina, Dec. 1--All of South America is closely watching the present political crisis in Chile because upon its solution depends whether the Communist party will be able to hold on to the only government position it has been able to win on this continent in twenty years of intensive effort.

headline.main: COMMUNIST CRISIS IN CHILE WATCHED; Red Effort to 'Organize' the Whole Continent and Its Failure Are Revealed 'POPULAR FRONT' WAS PLAN Orders Came From New York --'Anti-Imperialism' Is Still Rallying Cry

docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Dec. 3 --The Communist movement in South America is undergoing the most serious crisis in its history as the result of internal strife that has been aroused by Latin-American activities of the New York headquarters of the...
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Dec. 3 --The Communist movement in South America is undergoing the most serious crisis in its history as the result of internal strife that has been aroused by Latin-American activities of the New York headquarters of the Communist party.
